sentence: Christian Collins, a former campaign aide for Republican Sen. Ted Cruz of Texas, was endorsed by a cast of politicos with close Trump ties: Cruz, House Freedom Caucus members Reps. Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina and Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, and prominent 2020 presidential election denier and pillow peddler Mike Lindell.
author: Camila DeChalus
title: Less Trump, more winning: Why the results of one Republican primary in Texas could give hope to new conservative candidates who don't endlessly venerate the former president

sentence: Christian Collins, a former campaign aide for Republican Sen. Ted Cruz of Texas, was endorsed by a cast of politicos with close Trump ties: Cruz, House Freedom Caucus members Reps. Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina and Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, and prominent 2020 presidential election denier and pillow peddler Mike Lindell.

title: Less Trump, more winning: Why the results of one Republican primary in Texas could give hope to new conservative candidates who don't endlessly venerate the former president

sentence: Trump further overcame his critics by inviting 26-year-old Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., onto the stage after the Republican establishment shunned and tried to defeat him for his blunt criticisms.
author: Andy Schlafly
title: Trump's wizardry in Oz endorsement
